variants.text: By supporting this event, you're helping to foster the European bio-based ecosystem and create opportunities for the next generation of biotech innovators.
Together, we're building a thriving biotech community in Europe. Your participation helps create the connections and collaborations that drive innovation forward.
This event strengthens the local biotech ecosystem by bringing together diverse stakeholders - from academic researchers to industry veterans to early-stage founders.
Thanks for supporting the community! As a non-profit, every share, every connection, and every conversation helps us fulfill our mission of advancing European biotech innovation.
